title: How to Track Satellites Using n2yo.com

steps.headline: Go to the N2yo website.
steps.description: This site (external link below) tracks over 8 thousand satellites in real time.

steps.headline: Follow a satellite by either A) clicking on its name directly above the map (if shown), or B) by using the search database link at the upper right corner of the site.
steps.description: Information pertaining to the satellite will be displayed, including a continually updated map tracking the satellite's movement.

text: Go to the N2yo website. This site (external link below) tracks over 8 thousand satellites in real time. Follow a satellite by either A) clicking on its name directly above the map (if shown), or B) by using the search database link at the upper right corner of the site. Information pertaining to the satellite will be displayed, including a continually updated map tracking the satellite's movement.
